fullplot: Harold Lee and Kumar Patel are two stoners who end up getting the munchies. What they crave the most after seeing a TV advertisement, is a trip to White Castle. So from here, follows a journey for the burgers they require. On their way they will encounter many obstacles including a raccoon, a racist officer, and a horny Neil Patrick Harris.
plot: An Asian-American office worker and his Indian stoner friend embark on a quest to satisfy their desire for White Castle burgers.
title: Harold & Kumar Go to White Castle
